entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 7 April 2023
